Only a few minutes away from the beach in a quiet, serene setting.

Guests have full access to all amenities.  Resort amenities include 7 outdoor swimming pools, 8 whirlpool tubs, 11 tennis courts, fitness room, game room, bbq grills and more.

The resort is located close to the golf course at Kona Country Club. There is shopping and restaurants within 1 mile.

The address is: 78-7190 Kaleiopapa Street,
Kailua-Kona

Hawaii has an occupancy tax for guest and it's $8 per night at Holua/Wyndham Resort

A spacious 2br/2ba suite at Holua Resort @ Moana Loa Village Resort. The suite is fully furnished with a full kitchen, living room with sofa sleeper, dining area, king bed in master bedroom, 2nd bedroom has twin beds, washer/dryer & patio/balcony.

HouseRules:
No Pets and No Smoking inside suites. Substantial cleaning charges will apply for a violation of these rules.

We did have to change rooms due to this fact, but it was a small inconvenience. We learned that there are two companies in the same address, Holua Resort and Wyndham, the facilities at Wyndham are a bit more worn, but the apartment are otherwise the same. WiFi was more stable at Holua Resort.","picture":"https://a1.muscache.com/ic/users/9921668/profile_pic/1384887126/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Christina","rating":-1}]},"priceRange":[{"nightly":199,"start":1421280000,"end":1484352000,"maxNight":1125,"weekend":199,"monthly":5572,"minNight":3,"weekly":1393}],"availability":[{"start":1421280000,"end":1422057600},{"start":1422144000,"end":1422662400},{"start":1422921600,"end":1423526400},{"start":1424217600,"end":1484352000}]},{"id":"air2250912","latLng":[20.725680124706,-156.44545004873],"itemStatus":"published","attr":{"roomType":{"text":"Entire home/apt","id":0},"propType":{"text":"Apartment","id":0},"bathrooms":1,"description":"Comfortable and clean, this unit has many amenities.  Bedroom with King bed, Sleeper sofa with topper mattress in Living room, AC in bedroom and living room, Digital Cable TV/Wifi, tile floors, Washer/Dryer in unit, ceramic top stove, beach towels, chairs and cooler for your use. Pool, hot tub, BBQ in complex and the best beaches in south Maui. Many fine restaurants, shops, Foodland grocery store, basketball, tennis all less than 1 mile away.  You can also take wonderful day trips up to the summit of Haleakala and watch the sunrise, or drive to Hana and see beautiful waterfalls and forests.       

Shared amenities are the pool and hot tub as well as the barbecue area.  One free designated parking space across from the unit 

I would like to welcome every guest upon their arrival and provide orientation, but if that's not possible, then I will give full instructions by phone or email before their arrival and meet them shortly after when it's convenient for both of us.   

You can walk to Charlie Young  beach which is within a few hundred feet of the unit.  This is one of the most beautiful of the South Maui beaches and the sunsets are made for viewing. Go swimming, snorkeling, kayaking or paddle boarding.  Or maybe just lounge in the sand. There are also various restaurants and grocery stores all within walking distance.  A short drive will bring you to such luxury hotels as the Four Seasons and the Grand Wailea for an exquisite dining experience at their various restaurants.  All this and more.        

There are public buses, but renting a car is recommended. There is a free reserved parking space included.  Call for directions from the airport

Cool and comfortable this one bedroom/one bath unit comes with a full kitchen and is just block away from one of Maui's most beautiful beaches, a short walk to restaurants and grocery stores, with breathtaking sunsets at your doorstep

HouseRules:
There are no pets allowed and smoking is not allowed in the unit.  Other house rules will be posted in the We were touched by the nice welcome fruit basket from Maui when we first entered the condo. The condo is clean and well kept. Being near the ocean. its a great location and the views from it are breathtaking of the mountains on one side and ocean on the other side. Thank you John for making us feel welcome on your island.","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/defaults/user_pic-225x225.png?v=2","name":"Archana","rating":-1},{"date":1419206400,"text":"I had an amazing stay at this very clean, very comfortable 1 bedroom centrally located apartment. We will be back :)","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/ic/users/5467390/profile_pic/1363588415/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Joanna","rating":-1},{"date":1416873600,"text":"Great having John meet us at the unit and show us around. Enjoyed sitting on the deck morning and evening with a view of the ocean. We slept wonderfully in the king sized bed, just what we needed on this vacation. Thank you John!","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/ic/users/11484957/profile_pic/1396108976/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Christine","rating":-1},{"date":1414540800,"text":"We had a wonderful time and the condo was clean and cozy. John was a great host and promptly answered any questions we had. We loved staying here; it was quiet and we loved the pool and Jacuzzi on site with the beach just right across the street. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone wishing to visit Maui!","picture":"https://a0.muscache.com/ic/users/21577510/profile_pic/1411275659/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Denise","rating":-1},{"date":1413417600,"text":"Great condo. Great location, right across from the beach and a short walk to bars and restaurants.","picture":"https://a1.muscache.com/ic/users/6965605/profile_pic/1395762385/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Andy","rating":-1},{"date":1410220800,"text":"Jon was great! We maid a last minute reservation and john made everything easy for us. His place was clean and had all the amenities needed to enjoy Maui. Cooler, beach chairs, beach towels. I have to say we didn't use pool or jacuzzi in that the beach was right across the street. One note to mention: I was very pleased how johns place was well stocked with necessary travel items laundry detergent, ice, dish washing soap and soap for bathroom! Usually this is stuff you'd have to buy but john has gone over and beyond to make us feel welcomed. Thanks john!","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/ic/users/77569/profile_pic/1327563386/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"David","rating":-1},{"date":1409788800,"text":"The condo was a great value. John greeted us shortly after we landed to make sure we were comfortable and everything was okay. The space was more than enough, and the washer/dryer in the unit was a great plus. Most units around these prices make use of the public laundry in the complexes. The condo had everything we needed as a home away from home, although we didn't cook much. The location was the best part. Literally a walk across the street from the beach. Centrally located in South Kihei, so tons of restaurants and food trucks around that were great. Would definitely stay here again.","picture":"https://a1.muscache.com/ic/users/17468498/profile_pic/1404162501/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Jeffrey","rating":-1},{"date":1406764800,"text":"We loved the apartment! We packed lunches in the ice chest and used beach towels, chairs, sand toys, umbrella and a boogie board that were provided.  We even used the towels as protection from the cold at the top of the Haleakala Crater for our sunset photo ops. We slept great but the only negative thing and we agree with the other reviewer is the mosquitoes.  We had spray but didn't protect ourselves in the condo. Our unit in Maalaea Kai is located on Ma'alaea Bay and is truly one of Maui's best-kept secrets. You will be greeted by picturesque sunrises over Haleakala, expansive views of neighboring islands and the best whale watching vistas in the Hawaiian Islands. Beachfront access offers 5 miles of secluded white sandy beaches for leisurely strolling, safe swimming and snorkeling.

Our fourth floor oceanfront condo is located on the sought after side of the building. You will enjoy excellent views from the Master Bedroom, Kitchen, Living Room and Dining Area. Guest bedroom has views of sugar cane fields and West Maui mountains. This penthouse unit features 878 sq.ft of tastefully furnished living area with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Both the bedrooms contain Queen size beds with fresh linens. It is consistently given a very high rating by all the guests and even by the '(website hidden) bear'.

The updated kitchen is fully equipped with everything you will need. It has all appliances, a microwave, dishwasher, range/oven, all cookware and all the utensils for cooking delicious meals. The dining area has a round rattan glass table with 4 matching tropical armchairs. Living room features a 42' HDTV with cable and is setup with DVD player, VCR and Stereo.

Maalaea Kai Condominium complex features immaculately maintained grounds with dozens of loungers. Heated swimming pool and stainless steel BBQs complement the grounds. During whaling season, there are daily whale sightings from the grounds and lanais. This complex is located on the north end of Sugar Beach which extends till Kihei. Famous Maalaea 'Freight Train' surf waves break right in front of the property. These warm waters are excellent for snorkeling, kayaking and paddle boarding.

Local Attractions:
Maalaea Village is just 10 mins from the airport and has the famous Maalaea Harbor where you can get any number of tours for scuba diving, snorkeling adventure, whale watching, Molikini charters and sunset dinner cruises. Centrally located Lahaina, Wailea and Road to Hana are under 20 mins drive from Maalaea.

Things to do with Toddlers and Kids:
Maui Ocean Center is an excellent place which mixes fun, adventure and learning. This aquarium is a showcase for marine life in Maui like green sea turtles, monk seals and nation's largest collection of living sea coral. Certified divers are allowed to descend into Open Ocean Exhibit surrounded by Sharks, Sting rays and thousands of fish. Maui Golf and Sports Park has mini golf and bumper cars. Nearby Maui Plantation has zip-lining tours for ages 5 and up and a train ride around their plantation for tots. Sugar Cane Train in Lahaina is favorite for all Thomas Train buddies. Largest Banyan tree in America is in Lahaina too and is an excellent place for a picnic.

Shopping:
Costco and Wal-Mart stores are located few minutes from the airport. Trade Winds market and deli is nearby and sells locally grown food too. Major grocery stores are with-in ten-minute drive. Highly rated restaurants like Waterfront Restaurant are down the street from the property. Front street in Lahaina is fun to walk and best place to buy souvenirs.

Thanks

Always available on phone or email. Alex on the island will be able to help with anything you need in the unit.

- Centrally located - Short drive to Airport, Lahaina or Wailea.
- Beautiful ocean views and able to whale watch from the lanai/balcony. 
- 5 min walk to Sugar Beach , a 6 mile long white sand beach.
- Walking access to Maalaea Boat Harbor for all tours/trips.
- Maui Ocean Center Aquarium is just steps away.


Assigned parking available. It takes 20 mins to get to the unit from the Airport.

Oceanfront condo with panoramic views of the ocean. Just renovated in Sep 2014 with updated bathrooms and floors. Centrally located with 5 min walk to beach. Central A/C and fully furnished.

HouseRules:
Non-smoking and No Pets Allowed
Please note that smoking is not allowed inside the unit. Pets are not allowed as well to avoid any allergic reactions the pet fur might cause to other guests. The security deposit of $200 will be withheld if our housekeeping service notices there are pets.

Check-in and check-out times
The check-in time is 4.00 pm and check-out time is 10.00 am. House keeping service will arrive at 10.15am to clean up the unit for the next guests. Early check-ins are not allowed if we are booked back to back. If the previous day is vacant we might allow it. Please contact the owner to get confirmation so that we can ensure your door lock code works for early check-in.


Daily housekeeping service
Daily housekeeping services are not included in the rental rate. However, it is available at an additional rate.

Damage/Security Refund Policy Deposit
Thanks to our guests, we never have to withhold security deposit so far. However it can be withheld if notice signs of smoking or pets in the unit or damage to unit or furnishings. Security/damage deposit of $200 is fully refundable and it is refunded within 14 days after departure.

Tenants are responsible for any damage they may cause during their stay. Liability is not limited to the deposit amount. If damage caused by the tenant to any part of the rental property exceeds the amount of the damage deposit, tenant understands and agrees that they are responsible to pay the additional cost for replacement or repair of damaged items. Tenants and their guests agree to adhere to local laws, to not disturb the peace, keep the property in a clean and sanitary
condition, and will comply with the no smoking and not pets rule. 


Cancellation
A 60 day cancellation is required that way I can get it booked again. Thanks for understanding.

Monthly Reservation Cancellation
A 120 day cancellation is needed so that I can rebook the apartment. Thanks for understanding.

Maximum Occupancy
The rental amount quoted is for 4 people. For each additional guest there is a charge of $10.00 per person per night. The condo can only take a max of 6 people.

Minimum stay
There is a 4 night minimum stay unless there is a gap in the availability. Longer minimum stays may be required for holiday periods. For Christmas and New year’s 7 -10 night minimum stay is required based on the availability.

Linens and Towels
Rates include one-time linen-towel setup. Pool and other amenities on the grounds can be used without any additional charge.

Rate Changes
Rates are subject to change without notice.

Hold Harmless
The tenant and guests agree to indemnify and hold harmless the represented property owners from and against all claims, demands, loss, liability of any kind and character, including cost
of defense, arising out of or in any way connected with the tenant’s use of the property. In the event tenant or guests suffer personal/physical/property damage, injury, or loss. The property owners are not responsible for the tenants’ lost or stolen items.

Couple and family friendly condo apartment, remodeled and updated. Premier location for whale watching in season. Centrally located near Maaleae Village and Harbor. Short walks to the longest beach on Maui, to the Ocean Center & Aquarium, to several excellent harbor restaurants and shops, to the Ma'alaea Marina with deep sea fishing, snorkel and dinner sailings.  Great place for golfing vacation: courses are a 5 to 30 minute drive.  Off street parking. Near major bus route. Seasonal weekly rates begin at $875. We offer you an extremely comfortable full oceanfront apartment on lovely tropical property with a very relaxing atmosphere. A great value for the dollar spent. Book your place in paradise stay with us early to guarantee a most memorable trip.

Our Ma'alaea Village neighborhood is quiet and not congested with walking distance to shops, deli's, restaurants, and water activities.

Events","id":20}],"reviews":{"count":53,"rating":5,"entries":[{"date":1419033600,"text":"Cathy's apartment is exactly as it is described - a private, clean, and cozy getaway with gorgeous ocean views. We stayed Dec 14th-19th and had a perfect stay, the apartment truly felt like home. It was just big enough for 2 people and stocked with everything you'd need: 

-laundry
-full kitchen with cookware, serveware, drinkware, etc.
-beach gear including towels, snorkel gear boogie board, chairs, etc.
-extra sheets and blankets
-easy parking 

The private lanai was the most wonderful place to relax, eat breakfast, and just enjoy the sound of the crashing waves. We even saw a few whales in the distance and some sea turtles come up to shore!

The location was great. We rented a car and the apartment is close enough to the airport and pretty centralized from everything else on the island. There isn't a ton of shopping, restaurants, or swimming beaches within walking distance but it made for a nice quiet stay away from crowds and tourists. 

The sound of the waves could be heard from everywhere in the apartment. I will say, it was CRAZY windy our entire stay! I don't know if this is just common for December, but it was literally hold-onto-your-hat wind. It did make it nice to crack the windows and leave the lanai door open, we didn't have to use the AC much. 

Check in and check out was a breeze, even when we arrived very late at night. I would completely come back here and would recommend it to a friend. Thanks Cathy for a great stay!","picture":"https://a1.muscache.com/ic/users/22970548/profile_pic/1414553371/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Tessa","rating":-1},{"date":1418601600,"text":"This was a wonderful location and the home was very clean! Enjoyed watching the turtles out front in the surf.The location was great,being central to everything.The unit was clean and had everything that we needed  to cook and bbq.We definitely would come back","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/defaults/user_pic-225x225.png?v=2","name":"Jack","rating":-1},{"date":1409702400,"text":"The description is accurate – the condo is compact. It had a nice drop leaf table, but we'd have been hard-pressed to find a place to open it.  But there was room for the main things (us, our bags, cooking), and in such a prime location space is costly.  At the end of the day the place is well kept with a very nice staff.  And the view of the Bay is beautiful.  
More on location: There is a beautiful beach, at the end of the dead-end road the condo is on.  It was never crowded the whole time we were there.  You are centrally located, so really it is easy to get to the beginning of the Road to Hana, Kihei, Lahaina, Molokini Diving.  If you want to do everything possible in Maui, this is a great place to stay. But you definitely need a car - not a lot within walking distance, which we liked.
 A very nice bonus: The owner has stocked the place with lots of extras: binoculars, snorkel gear, beach chairs & towels, boogie board. Internet service was fast.  This was a late segment of a rare, extended vacation.  We couldn't be more grateful for the mini laundry.  We didn't turn the TV on once, but it was there, and seemed to be hooked up.  We didn't use the grill, nor the pool & hot tub, but they looked lovely.  Our first day there we went for a walk and found a huge sea turtle just basking, right beyond the seawall of the complex.
Only a few negatives: The place could use some new bed linens - they were clean but the fitted sheet was worn to the point that it wouldn't stay on the bed.  And mosquitoes were a problem. I know: it’s a tropical island, so this might not be fair.  Still we kind of expected that if we didn't leave doors open & minimized our lights in the evening, that we would be OK.  We both love sleeping to the sound of the surf.  There is no relying on the screens; the screen in the lanai door is separating from the frame near the door handle; somehow they found their way in.  Finally the last 2 nights we ended up sealing the windows, turning on the AC, making a round to swat the critters and going to bed.  That worked!

We had an excellent time.","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/defaults/user_pic-225x225.png?v=2","name":"Lionel","rating":-1},{"date":1408406400,"text":"The apartment is great! It is nicely appointment, and the furnishings are comfortable. The kitchen also has everything one may need on a vacation (including coffee/tea and misc spices etc). The availability of a washer and dryer as well as plenty of towels is also great. An additional plus is all the picnic stuff (chairs, umbrellas, cooler box etc) Carolyn has provided. Couple this with the snorkeling gear she has provided, and you have the makings for a great day out.

Also the roof has panoramic views of the ocean along with some grills and tables/chairs (note there are also some obstructed, but still nice views of the ocean from the apartment). Its also a great spot to enjoy a nice bottle of wine (or whatever else you may fancy) and watch the sunset.

A small drawback is that the bedroom is right next to the elevators/apartment hallway, and it can get noisy at times (it gets quiet after 10pm) so if you are jet lagged, then it may be an idea to catch a few early winks in the living room, and then move to the bedroom after 10pm. Of course, this is of no fault to the host, but something to note if you are a light sleeper.

The location is right across the beach which is fantastic. The shops right next door are also a big plus (note the Boss frogs is in the same complex so can make bookings of tours etc easy) and have some great restaurants and cafes. Also a tip, if you want to see some green sea turtles they come to the beach across the street (I saw them around 2pm, but the sea was a little rough, so if you want to snorkel the morning may be better). Some tips on the location; if you are into bars/pubs then Lahaina seems to have most of the options, and its about 40 mins away, but if you want to relax by the beach, and check out the natural beauty Kihei is awesome. Some great snorkeling spots are minutes away (Ahihi bay, and Turtle town were particularly good).

Overall, I had a great time at this place, and Carolyn was very generous with her accommodation of our arrival and departure time.","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/defaults/user_pic-225x225.png?v=2","name":"Manav","rating":-1},{"date":1401062400,"text":"The unit was clean, convenient and perfect for our trip. This condo was very nice with all the things you need. Location was great and the Kamaole beaches were beautiful.","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/defaults/user_pic-225x225.png?v=2","name":"Catherine","rating":-1},{"date":1399939200,"text":"We had a fun time staying in Kihei on our first trip to Maui.  The condo is in a great location - literally almost across the street from Kamaole I Beach.  I didn't find the condo noisy at all (but it seemed like there wasn't a lot of people in the complex when we stayed).  I thought the bed and pillows were very comfortable (and I'm 7 months pregnant!).  There are plenty of towels and kitchen supplies.  The TV and internet worked great.  So did the washer/dryer.  We used Maui Baby Rentals as recommended by Carolyn to get a toddler bed delivered - it did fit in the bedroom and was already there when we showed up.  There are some random useful supplies already in the unit (stroller, beach umbrella, coolers and ice packs, etc). Overall, we were very satisfied.

One thing I'll mention, however... The kitchen did have roaches.  Over the 10 days, we saw about 15 of them.  Most were hanging out around the sink.  We did let Carolyn know by e-mail and she replied that she contacted the front desk about it.  We never heard anything from the front desk so we talked directly to a maintenance person that we ran into.  He gave us some traps that we put under the sink, which helped but didn't make them go away.  He did say that the exterminators had skipped this unit because they couldn't get in so it was never sprayed for roaches.  Personally, I will ask Carolyn if the unit has been sprayed before staying here again.  But we did a lot of cooking in the unit and had our two-year-old there.  If you aren't really planning on cooking, this may not be an issue for you.  After seeing the roaches, we did inspect the bedroom for bedbugs and didn't find anything (whew!).  I would have given this place 5 stars with no roaches and 4 stars if the traps had worked completely but since our little buddies stuck around to bid us farewell on the last day, I give this unit 3 stars.","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/defaults/user_pic-225x225.png?v=2","name":"Bonnie","rating":-1},{"date":1398729600,"text":"The unit was great, very comfortable and well equipped. It is built in a Coconut Grove of mature trees and done in plantation/island style. It is walking distance to beaches, restaurants , shopping, etc. It is only 15 minutes north of the Lihue airport. This location allows you to drive to Hanalei ( north) in 30 minutes and also to Poipu ( south) in 30 minutes. If you prefer not to rent a car, stores are within walking distance and the bus stops in front. 
Our Suite C15 is a renovated second floor unit that overviews the pool and garden. The one bedroom houses 2 double beds with TV, ceiling fan and A/C. While the living room has a queen size sofa bed, Flat Screen TV, DVD player, ceiling fan and A/C, sleeping 4 -6 people comfortably. All high quality necessary linens included. Full kitchen with all appliances, equipped with all kitchen tools needed to prep for a great family meal. There are laundry facilities in each building. 
This hotel features 3 outdoor pools with hot tubs. Shuffleboard is available at Hale Suites Plantation. BBQ facilities are on site. Reservations for water sports and activities can be arranged at the front desk. 
Within easy reach of the beach, Plantation Hale Suites is in Kapaa (Wailua), close to Smith Family Garden Luau, Lydgate Beach Park, and Sleeping Giant Trailhead. Also nearby are Town Park and Opaekaa Falls Overlook. 
Parking and WIFI are included!


Guest can access to resort swimming pool with hot tubs, BBQ facilities.

Guests can get the key , ask for any questions and travel information at the front desk. 

Guests can always email, TEXT, or call me any time if there is any questions or suggestions.

The location is centrally located to a variety of activities and shopping on either end of the island. Also within walking distance to the beach, restaurants, Coconut market, Farmer's market, stores like Safeway, Foodland, Longs Drugs , and hiking trails.

There is Kauai bus stop in front of the resort. You can ride to Costco, etc. Check with the front desk for detail.

On the scenic Royal Coconut Coast, just steps from Waipouli Beach, this hotel features 3 outdoor pools with hot tubs and an on-site spa. Guest suites provide full kitchens. Shuffleboard, BBQ facilities, reservations for water sports all available.

Happy to recommend to other guests.","picture":"https://a0.muscache.com/ic/users/1552156/profile_pic/1325787863/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Ai","rating":-1},{"date":1404518400,"text":"TL;DR the suite was great, and the location was perfect.

We had an excellent stay in the Plantation Hale suite.  The suite was very clean and had convenient amenities, including a full kitchen.  The porch was a great spot to relax on during the day, and the pool was nice for taking a quick dip.  

While the suite itself provided a comfortable home base, its best aspect was its location.  We chose to stay near Kapa’a for its proximity to the airport and also for access to both the north and south sides of the island within a one-hour drive.  The suite is conveniently located right across the street from Hukilau Lanai, which is the best restaurant we ate at on the island.  Another great restaurant, Oasis, is just a few hundred yards down the road.  You can easily walk to the beach behind Hukilau Lanai (about 100 yards from the suite), which has beautiful views.  Although many people swim there, there are amazing beaches a few miles to the north or south, including Kapa’a beach park.  

Nancy was a very nice person to interact with.  Checkin and checkout were professional and straightforward.

The Sofa sleeper in living room will comfortably sleep a family of 4. Other featured amentities:
* Solid teak wood dining table w/6 leather chairs 
* Kitchenaid dishwasher (to help clean up after a dinner party)
* Washer/dryer in unit
* 2 Smart HD TVs (40" and 47") with Netflix (at no charge)
* Onsite concierge to help you plan the perfect activities for your vacation
* Super fast high speed Internet (30 mbps download speed)


Guests have access to everything, including the putting green, tennis courts, pool, kids' playground, small workout gym, bocce ball, shuffleboard and all the other amenities. The Cliffs also features classes including basket weaving, cliff-side yoga, pilates, introduction to scuba, cooking classes, and botanical tours.

Our goal is to have you maximize the time you are able to enjoy your vacation.  The front desk is readily available to help make your stay magical.

We cherish each day we are able to spend on the North shore.  Once you book, we will share with you more specifics about some of our favorite activities.

And we just uploaded a video walk through of our unit here: http (colon) (backslash) (backslash) www (period) youtube (period) com (backslash) watch?v=VJ YNY7lU0A

The Lihue airport is about 45 minutes away. We suggest renting a car to then also provide maximum flexibility while you are here.

The average annual temperature in Princeville is over 75 degrees.  The location of the resort overlooks a cliff, and thus we are treated to a lovely south easterly trade wind. We have a couple ceiling fans to help circulate the air in the unit, and the resort has a few portable fans available upon request.

Note: Until confirmed, rates are subject to change without notice.

Experience the simplicity of the North shore at the Cliffs resort, while staying in our completely renovated family condo (September 2013).
Enjoy the zen-like spa showers and gourmet kitchen. And when you're ready for an adventure, our unit is centrally located 10 minutes from the hamlet of Hanalei.

HouseRules:
1. All our guests are required to relax and enjoy their vacation.
2. Our condo and all buildings at the Cliffs are smoke-free environments. This is firmly enforced.
3. No pets on the property
4. There is no daily housekeeping service. If you want a change of sheets or towels, you can bring the dirty linens to housekeeping between 8am - 4pm.
5. In Kauai, it is customary to remove your shoes before entering a home.

No hidden charges/All fees /taxes included!
Thank you for checking out my beautiful condo! This is a remodeled, oceanfront studio unit ,located in Royal Kahana Resort . This unit is used as the resorts model unit for all other studios. The layout maximizes the space available leaving the guest with lots of extra room. With an amazingly comfortable king size bed in the center of the room, lots of dresser drawers and closet space for your items, and a desk area for guests who still need to get work done. The unit is located on the 3rd floor in a very quiet and private side of the resort. The patio offers an outdoor dining area with stunning ocean and garden views for you to enjoy, you can also watch humpback whales play during the winter months. Fully stocked, there is nothing for you to do except arrive and relax! 

*Free Parking ( Pick up permit at Activities Desk)
*Free Wifi in the unit
*Beach Towels
*Beach Chairs
*Cooler

The Royal Kahana Resort:
This resort is one of West Maui's premiere vacation destinations! This beachfront/oceanfront complex is situated on beautiful white sand Kahana Beach perfect for swimming, turtle sightings, whale watching in the winter months and simply relaxing. The resort is centrally located between Ka`anapali and Kapalua. Its ideal location provides guests the quite atmosphere of Kahana while only minutes away from activities and sightseeing that makes Maui one of the highest visited islands in the world. There is above level and an underground parking garage as well as an onsite fitness center free for guests. The property is conveniently located close to shops and restaurants within walking distance. 

Surrounding Area Within 5 minute walk:
*Whalers General Store and gas station:
Perfect for snacks, drinks, sunscreen, magazines, Hawaiian gifts, ect. Plus they have a Red Box located in the store as well.

*McDonald's restaurant

*Kahana Grill
Five star dining with great atmosphere. Dinner only

*Maui Brew Co.
A local favorite. Maui's only local brewery with an affordable and delicious menu. Lunch and Dinner.

*Black Angus Steakhouse
Certified black angus steaks, fresh seafood and amazing sushi bar. $5 breakfast on Saturday and Sunday! Best deal on the island!

*Dollies Pizza and Pub
Local favorite sports bar and pizza joint. Affordable, great food with a fun bar scene for after hours. Lunch-midnight. 

*Sands of Kahana pool side restaurant
Nicknamed the 'jewel by the pool' this ocean front restaurant has been here over 20 years and is great for a quick bite to eat for breakfast, lunch or dinner. 

*Bank of Hawaii

*Gift Shops

*Jewelry Store 

These are just the immediate restaurants and shops next to the resort. There is also a local health food store with a farmers market in the mornings just down the road, wellness center, bad-ass local coffee store, Times Supermarket, Napili Supermarket and shopping center. 


PingPong/Tennis/Gym/Pool.  Be sure to pick up wristbands at the Activities Desk at the Lobby for pool access. You can also check out tennis rackets should you decide to play tennis as well!

ALWAYS answering questions as soon as I am able to. Everyone who stays at my studio is very special to me and your great experience at Maui means a lot to me. Reach out anytime!

Mellow, quiet, walkable to everything.  A great place to chill out, and all the action/night life is just a short drive.  

There's shuttles taking you to Lahaina for under $2. A rental car is recommended, however. 

NO HIDDEN CHARGES HERE! All fees included! Whaler Village/Kaanapali /Napili /Kapalua are just minutes away from this Beach front/beach access condo.  Lots of amenities for guests.  Prices during high season is higher ( December-March)

Although a studio, it has a king size bed. The lanai has a great view of the ocean just as pictured in his description. Located just north of Lahaina in Kahana, it's central to everything you want to do in Maui. Do you like nightlife? The Maui Brewing Co. and Dolly's pub is only a block away. How about a mexican eatery and bar called Nacho's, only 2 miles south.  Looking for some great restaurants? Eat at the Sea House Restaurant in Napili right on the beach as you watch the sunset as you dine. Or more upscale Merriman's Restaurant. Gorgeous place right on the beach also. Both are 2 to 3 miles north of Lahaina. Wanna zipline? Just 4 miles north on HWY 30. Wanna snorkel and swim with sea turtles and see dolphins and humpback whales, just go to Westin Resort about 3 miles south and buy a trimaran cruise to a secret cove. You also definitely have to buy a cruise to a nearby island Lanai and snorkel and suntan at the Four Seasons Resort and hotel. They have the best poolside bar in Hawaii. Sip the Napili Sunset cocktail and you're in heaven. But getting back to Jay's condo, it's so fabulous. It has a concierge that will plan and purchase all your activities in Maui. Step out the back and there's a good sized pool and out the gate and you're at the beach. I can't recommend any other place than Jay's condo. Only things missing is a restaurant and a bar.

Romantic, beachfront studio located in the Royal Kahana. Unit #416 has been remodeled and restocked with brand new furniture and appliances. The king size bed was just purchased in September 2013 and is amazingly comfortable. The entire kitchen has been remodeled and replaced with everything down to the king size plastic tumblers perfect for enjoying your drinks poolside! The unit offers free wifi and has a brand new 'smart TV'. Hook up your phone or computer over the wifi and enjoy streaming all your photos, music and netflix account through the TV. Perfect for couples looking to spend quality time together watching gorgeous sunsets right from the lanai. Enjoy strolling hand in hand on Royal Kahana's sandy beach, or explore the numerous shops, farmer's markets, and world class dining all within walking distance of Royal Kahana 416!

We've created a really nice environment for our guests in the condo.  Very comfortable, clean and up to date.  Really low key relaxing resort where you can explore the local neighborhood and beaches or explore the entire island of Maui.

Everything 'Maui' in a very comfortable condo.  Depending on how long you stay and what you like to do, you can do as much or as little as you like and have a great, fun, relaxing time.

We interact with our guests to notify them of how and what to do upon arrival.  We let you know your local contact should you need them.  I usually check in via email the day after someone checks in to make sure all is good and answer any questions.

This resort is one of West Maui's premiere vacation destinations! This beachfront/oceanfront complex is situated on beautiful white sand Kahana Beach perfect for swimming, turtle sightings, whale watching in the winter months and simply relaxing. The resort is centrally located between Ka`anapali and Kapalua. Its ideal location provides guests the quite atmosphere of Kahana while only minutes away from activities and sightseeing that makes Maui one of the highest visited islands in the world. There is above level and an underground parking garage as well as an onsite fitness center free for guests. The property is conveniently located close to shops and restaurants within walking distance. 

Once you book, we have a website that is full of beaches, restaurant suggestions, directions and all sorts of other useful information.

Everything...it's mellow, yet has everything you could ask for.

HouseRules:
CONDO GUIDELINES
1.There is no smoking in the condo.  There is no smoking on the balcony / lanai.  There is no smoking in the building.  There is a designated smoking area near the street approx 300' away from the building.  Please ask the front desk.  

There will be a minimal loss of the $500 deposit if there is smoking in the condo.

There has never been any smoking in the condo since our ownership and we appreciate your cooperation with this.

2.If there is anything destroyed or lost, the security deposit will be utilized to pay for the damages or loss. 

3.If anything breaks, please email or text us immediately and if you can snap a photo of it, please send that too.  We understand that an occasional glass or dish will break.  Please, just let us know...

4.Please respect the quiet times of the condo and other guests later in the evening and early in the morning.

5.Trash can be emptied on the Bottom Floor in the trash containers near the entrance to the garage.  There is a trash and recycle bin there.

6.Please wash off your feet, shake out towels and hose off beach chairs before coming into the condo…it will make for a more comfortable stay for you!

Chillax Inn Hawaii is a newly remodeled Hawaiian Resort Style Home offering 4 Bedrooms + 3 Baths with a Classic in ground Swimming Pool and a very HOT therapeutic (Chemical Free) Hot Tub all on a gated, fenced and secure property in Paradise! 

Our well stocked 3200 s/f Vacation Rental features: 
-Newly Remodeled Swimming Pool with a double LED light show and rafts and noodles for you use and enjoy!
-Hot Tub - cleaned using ONLY Food Grade Hydrogen Peroxide for a truly Therapeutic Spa experience!
-2 Large Living Rooms 
-Large Master Suite with Private Balcony, Resort Style Walk in shower with shower bench and wet bar!
-Open Kitchen Plan - Indoor Dining Room Table seats 8 persons - perfect for entertaining groups!
-3 LARGE outdoor balconies (lanai) also for dinning and relaxing
-Covered outdoor patio with gas-fired Barbecue Grill
-Fire Pit with lumber provided - A Unique Lava Rock design adjacent to the pool side for moon light fire side chats.
-The house is stocked with:
Beach Chairs, Beach Towels, Boogie Boards, Surf Boards and Snorkel masks and fins for your use.
-Large Poolside Outdoor Shower beside the Banana Grove - Cleanse under the stars in our unique 3-person outdoor shower!
-Private antique 2 person bath tub room
-Washer +Dryer
-Free High Speed Wi-Fi internet connection
-Great Cell Phone reception - NOT all properties on the Big Island have solid Cell phone reception..WE DO!
Smoking is Permitted OUTDOORS only!

All in a beautiful Private secure tropical setting! 
This entire Property is securely fenced and PRIVATE COMPOUND with an electric gate for car assess.
Secure off street parking for up to 5 cars. 
City Bus (for Island Wide Service) stops 4 doors from our Property

Chillax Inn seeks eco-friendly guests who are visiting & exploring the Big Island of Hawaii. As a holistic retreat, we encourage and practice organic compositing, recycling, and spiritual healing. 

Walk to all of historic Pahoa Town's eclectic shops, cafes, day spas and restaurants. 
Only 3 blocks from the area's only all natural grocery store (Island Naturals Market & Deli) and free Olympic size community pool. 
Near natural lava-fed Warm Pond, Kehena black sand beach (clothing optional), Pohoiki Bay Surf & Boat Dock, Kapoho tide pools for snorkeling and the active Lava flow from Kiluea Volcano! While you're here don't miss Pahoa's famous Farmer's Markets! 4 every week!

Historic Hilo Town (airport) is just 20 minutes away. Check out the Hawaii Tropical Botanical Gardens, Tsunami Museum, Akaka Falls, University of Hawaii Planetarium, Zoo, Hilo Farmer's Market, and Hawaii's only indoor shopping mall with major chain department stores. 
Have a unique stay in this magnificent Tropical Private Home in Paradise!

The entire private 1/2 race property is for your use. 

Helpful Caretaker lives off property. Just next door and available for anything you need. 

yes, just 2 block walk to the bus stop!

CHILLAX INN HAWAII - NEW RENTAL! 
4 Bedroom +3.5 Bath, Sleeps 10!
Centrally Located in Pahoa Village! Our very large pool house offers lots of room for the entire family. All in a LUSH GATED HAWAIIAN PRIVATE Oasis, close to all Island Activities.

All the trim wood came from the property.  The main sleeping space is a 10' X 10' loft space with sloping limited height ceiling. Downstairs is a fold down futon couch good for one adult or two children.   There is a spacious, custom tiled bathroom and a covered deck to enjoy a sunny breakfast outdoors with views of the pasture, Ohia trees and the distant ocean.  For entertainment we have a medium size TV and a good supply of DVD's.  The sound system is bluetooth accessible for a wireless connection to the music on your phone, lap top or pad.  A cell phone booster in the Studio allows connection to the outside world, as needed.
     We have a large 24' Yurt available as well as our Studio cottage.  Both have access to hi speed WiFi.  They are 50m apart but together can sleep up to 8.  Both have kitchens and bathrooms.  The Yurt has a large 40X40 wrap around covered deck.  Paauilo is Paradise.  We call our home Emerald acres.  Add the Yurt to your stay for a total of $155/night for both the cottage and Yurt.

Guests have access to Honokaa town filled with Hawaiian artifacts, the famous Waipio Valley, Hilo Town and the famous Waimea town with its two Saturday markets and the best Island restaurants. The road to the top of Mauna Kea is not far.  World class beaches of the Kohala coast are 45 minutes away and America's most visited attraction, the Volcano National Park, is a one hour drive, that's if you don't spend an hour first, in old Hilo town.

Only on an "as needed" basis.  We live about 30 minutes away in Waimea town.  We will meet you at the property at check in only, as needed.  Our directions to the house are great and all information is there in a folder.  Off grid living is the best!!

As quoted from the recently published: "My Year in A Yurt:  It was this studio we stayed in.  We absolutely loved the place, the lush grass-coverd rolling hills, the stately Ohia trees dotting the land, the ocean in the distance.  It was so peaceful, so quiet, so healing."
Yes,  you are far from the urban madding crowd in a peaceful, quiet and rural location.  We are surrounded by green; green grass, green trees, and green plants everywhere with wild turkeys and the occasional wild pig running madly across the pasture.  Nights are clear and stars are blinding.  Rain is possible but more likely are 15 knot trade winds which keep the air clear and fresh at a cool 1600' elevation.  Our place is an ideal location from which to  explore all parts of the Big Island.  However, it is a  minimum 20 minute drive to the nearest town of any size, Honokaa town and 45 minutes to the best gold coast white sand beaches.

You will need your own car.  Some limited public transportation, Heleon Bus service, is available at the bottom of the road to Hilo and Kona towns.  Bike rentals are available in Honokaa.

You may find that on occasion a local rancher will drive down the road to water his cows in the acreage below our place.  Also the neighbor dogs love to come visit our guests and you may see wild turkeys perched in the trees.

Tranquil, private, setting amid stately Ohia trees with partial ocean views. The custom studio is 500sf with a limited height loft and large gorgeous bathroom and deck. Off grid with installed hi speed WiFi & cell booster. (Yurt avail. for lgr grps).

HouseRules:
Rule No. 1, enjoy your self and make yourself at home.   
Feel free to eat whatever food is there.  We provide a fruit plate and eggs along with lox and bagels with creme cheese.  Coffee, tea and Ovaltine is also provided.  A special treat is Mamane Bakery honey nut pineapple bran muffins and pineapple upside down muffins. We had everything we needed and enjoyed every single minute. 

As we arrived the fridge was filled with lot's of delicious food. It was not like arriving at an apartment from Airbnb, it was like coming home.","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/ic/users/22538737/profile_pic/1413469712/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Felix","rating":-1},{"date":1417564800,"text":"We have enjoyed our stay at Baki and Bailey’s wonderful ‘of the grit’ home very much!
They have made us feel very welcome, arranged a very nice breakfast for our first day and had a lot of information about the sights and activities. The location of the house is wonderfully quit and peaceful but still not too far away from sights and activities.
The road could not be found by our gps but was easy to find with the information we received from Bailey.","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/defaults/user_pic-225x225.png?v=2","name":"Marleen","rating":-1},{"date":1416873600,"text":"WOW! What a place. My wife and I just arrvied home after spending 7 days at Baki & Bailey's awesome "hideaway". Located on 8 acres of property, this home away from home was just what we needed. The pictures don't do it justice! Baki & Bailey are super accomodating and the fruit platter, treats and salmon were a great surprise when we arrived after our long flight from Toronto. They always answered any questions we had. They made up a great binder full of ideas, places to eat, where to visit, beaches, markets..etc. It was very helpful. 
The property is beautiful and the house was a cozy home away from home for us. We loved having our coffee on the deck each morning. Even though we were living "off the grid" (solar power and rain water), we never felt like we were . There was never any problems with water pressure, hot or cold, or power. There is a proper stove/oven, toaster oven, small fridge, coffee maker and grinder and a massive bathroom! We found that the best place for wi-fi was out on the deck. They also provided a massive collection of dvd's to watch on the flat screen TV at night. 
Every day we were greeted by a flock of turkeys running around the property. Cows are also  in a field at the end of the property. 
We spent most of our time touring the island..... the Volcano National Park, several beaches, different towns and sights but it was always nice to come home to this slice of heaven. It was a little hard to find the first night as we arrived in the evening but Baki and Bailey met us there after a helpful neighbour pointed us in the right direction. Bailey showed us the "in's and out's" of the place and left us to enjoy our stay. They were always a phone call away. 
We totally loved our time on the island and at Baki & Bailey's place and would definitely recommend staying here. We had an awesome time on our first trip to Hawaii and we'll be back for sure.

Colin & Kasey
Barrie, Ontario, Canada","picture":"https://a1.muscache.com/ic/users/23484353/profile_pic/1415463719/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Colin & Kasey","rating":-1},{"date":1415664000,"text":"We absolutely loved our stay!  We visit frequently the area for work and prefer staying out of the hotels.  This allowed for easy access (not all roads are this nice!), privacy, all the comforts we needed and true R&R! B&B had graciously stocked us with breakfast items which was much appreciated! Therefore, do not shop until you check in! Between these supplies and what previous guests have left, one is well set. We did not shop until next day, and needed very little other than our dinner items. The gas grill is very handy!  Plenty of electricity, water, hot water, kitchen utensils, linens etc. better selection of dvd's than our local small town mart I think.  Wifi worked great on laptop and smart phones. My iPad was a bit more picky and slow, probably because it is a wee bit full or something, but did work. Phone booster worked great as well, just know that you have to set in cradle in case you were to scratch your head for a bit as this technologically challenged gal had to. Our kids could reach us at any time, which was a great relief. Recommend? ABSOLUTELY! Hope to stay again sometime soon!  B&B were awesome hosts and just a text or call away with any questions!!!  A+++++++","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/ic/users/6771960/profile_pic/1370535112/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Jessica","rating":-1},{"date":1415059200,"text":"We enjoyed the stay to the fullest! it isn`t just a room or a apartment it is a complete home! Everything you could need is provided. so you can relax from the very first second :)
We were so impressed from this home and as we opend the fridge.... we thought we are in heaven!it was stuffed with the best things the island offers!(this fruitplate was huge and so delicious)
if you want to come to this island please stay at Baki's and Bailey's house! this is a wonderful experience and this place gives you energy for your life back home!

Thank you Baki and Bayley!
Natalie and Martin","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/ic/users/3387169/profile_pic/1346082242/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Natalie","rating":-1},{"date":1414800000,"text":"We spent three nights in Baki and Bailey's House - the most comfortable slice of paradise I can imagine. Initially we had plans and excursions scheduled for each day, but we loved the atmosphere in this hideaway so much that we spent most of our time on the property. Everything was very thoughtfully provided, the food was great. There were no sounds except for the wind and the birds and the occasional blast of rain on the roof. We caught a good glimpse of the wild turkeys and were accompanied by the cute tiny neighbour's dog throughout a whole day. The house is exceptionally well equipped. Excursions are possible, but primarily this place invites to stay!","picture":"https://a1.muscache.com/ic/users/12286491/profile_pic/1392569578/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Matthias","rating":-1},{"date":1413417600,"text":"Talk about off the grid! Really, if like us, you don't like the crowd, the 5 stars resorts and such, this is the place where to stay on Big Island!!! The access way is just amazing. 5 minutes uphill into the woods, to end up in a little chunk of Paradise, just for you (well, and a couple of wild turkeys or pigs). You just have the impression to stay 1000 miles from any other human being.
There is plenty of room, every needed bit of equipment, BBQ on the patio aswell. Power and water don't come from ground lines, but we never had problems with that. Fridge was loaded when we arrived.
There is wireless internet aswell, which is important for ppl like us from abroad, albeit reception is much better on the patio and a bit poor inside, at times.
Clean and roomy, it's really a nice place where to cool off after a day exploring the Island. We sadly didn't take enough time to enjoy it, as we were on a very busy schedule to visit everything and it takes some time to travel from A to B, considering if only have the belt road going around it, or the saddle rd to the north. You need to consider some time to travel to Kona, the Volcano national park (a couple of hours, both) or South Point (3+ hours).

Baki and Bailey are the cutest hosts, happy to help and quick to reply if you need something, while at the same time "invisible", if you prefer to be on your own. They also provide a folder with many useful informations about the island.

Only practical thing to consider, if you plan to eat somewhere else, especially breakfast, like we do: The first town, Honooka, is around 15 miles down the road. Waimea some 40 min to the north and Hilo about an hour to the south. All of them are VERY good ideas. We absolutely recommend any of these for breakfast, as Grandma's kitchen (Honooka), Hawaiian Style Cafe (Waimea) and Ken's house of pancakes (Hilo), are between the very best places where we ever had breakfast in the US.","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/ic/users/18795494/profile_pic/1406203217/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Matteo","rating":-1}]},"priceRange":[{"nightly":95,"start":1421280000,"end":1484352000,"maxNight":30,"weekend":95,"monthly":2350,"minNight":3,"weekly":600}],"availability":[{"start":1421798400,"end":1422057600},{"start":1422748800,"end":1423180800},{"start":1423440000,"end":1423612800},{"start":1424736000,"end":1424908800},{"start":1425168000,"end":1426204800},{"start":1426809600,"end":1437696000},{"start":1438041600,"end":1484352000}]},{"id":"air551088","latLng":[19.436138165821,-155.24734712223],"itemStatus":"published","attr":{"roomType":{"text":"Entire home/apt","id":0},"propType":{"text":"Cabin","id":2},"bathrooms":1,"description":"MENEHUNE MANSIONS

Thanks Leslie for a wonderful few days.","picture":"https://a1.muscache.com/ic/users/6278405/profile_pic/1367969939/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"David","rating":-1},{"date":1413676800,"text":"Leslie was great. The space was also very clean, and everything - from the linens to the surroundings - had a fresh feel. The location is ideal for visiting the volcano and all the hikes in the area. Amazingly quiet, this Tiki Treasure is surrounded by lush tropical landscaping just steps from the ocean.  You'd never know that you were in the center of Kona with restaurants, shops and the ocean on your doorstep!

This 400 sq ft super clean studio is part of a totally non-smoking complex. (A small area at the edge of the property is designated for smoking).  Value for money is excellent with many little extra treats provided, particularly for those staying a few days or more.

There is a small but efficient kitchenette, perfect for preparing breakfast and lunch. Although there is no stove in the unit, there are 2 large BBQs available in the pool area if you would like a to use them.  They are cleaned daily and BBQ utensils are provided in the unit.

A refrigerator, programmable full size coffee pot, microwave, toaster oven, blender and rice cooker are available for your use, along with all the basic kitchen utensils, plates, mugs bowls etc.  Paper products, saran wrap, foil and a basic selection of condiments can also be found for your convenience.

The unit is well stocked for your beach adventures.  Beach towels, new Boogie boards, Tommy Bahama back-pack chairs, cooler, beach bag, beach umbrella, sunblock and snorkel gear.  Even some beach stuff for the kids!

New queen size bed, new pillows, bedding and luxury sheets make for a heavenly like sleep experience.  There's also a day bed which will sleep one adult or could accommodate 2 small children sleeping top-to-toe :-)

The shower and bathroom area are separate from the kitchen in this unit.  The shower is original to the unit but is exceptionally clean and has a large shower head with great water pressure!  (We are remodeling shortly and will update with pictures when complete - hopefully by the end of 2014) . Beautiful luxury towels are provided for your comfort.

A tropical style ceiling fan, AC with remote control and flat screen TV are also provided, along with books and magazines of local interest. 

This is a corner unit on the second floor with a slightly larger Lanai than most, and a view of the pool, hot tub and beautifully maintained tropical grounds.  Enjoy coffee or cocktails, breakfast or lunch and in the evenings perhaps dinner while enjoying the tiki torches!

Free On-Site parking is on a space available basis - usually fills up late in the afternoon, but additional parking is available across the street, and also next to Bubba Gump for a small daily fee (I believe it's still $3/day). If you are arriving in the evening or at night, we will help locate parking for you - just let us know :-)  If you're not renting a car to begin your trip, there's a shuttle available from the airport for less than $30 (you must pre-book, so ask about the option).  A cab should be around $40.

Free Internet access is available from the unit with a code which will be provided upon arrival.  A coin operated laundry facility is available on site.

The majority of the units in our complex are privately owned and operated. Owners take great pride in their units so visitors, be they friends, family or paying guests can all enjoy to the same level.  We want you to make yourselves at home and enjoy all the unit has to offer.  Our unit is exceptionally quiet, no noise from Ali'i Drive and yet only steps from all the restaurants, shops - it is truly an oasis!

The condo is cleaned only upon departure.  If you are staying for an extended period we can arrange for additional cleaning of the unit and linens at the guest's expense - just let us know.

Whether you're staying for a night, a week or a month we look forward to helping you discover the best the Island has to offer and can even help you arrange other short stays around the island if you'd like to spend some time exploring the Volcano - a must see, we believe, especially if your visit will be a once in a lifetime event!

We strive to provide a clean, comfortable environment for your stay and great value for money!  Ours is a beautiful little gem which we believe you will fall in love with :-)  We will do everything we can to make sure your vacation is special and filled with wonderful memories as you explore this incredible Island!

With much Aloha, 
Virginia & Lee






Pool, Hot Tub, Laundry, 2 Large BBQ grills, free parking.

Available to greet you and show you the unit.  We live only 15 minutes away and are available to answer ANY questions you may have.  Phone, text, email as little or as much as you would like.

Location is awesome and tough to beat! Fabulous Lava Java cafe/restaurant next door, great for any a time of the day.  The Coconut Grove offers many dining, shopping options and nightlife. In the opposite direction the Farmers Market is only a block away. Wonderful fresh fruits and vegetables - a great place to stop daily for something different.

The Kona Pier is within a half mile walk.  Great place to go for an early morning swim, or to paddle board or snorkel.  Watch the local paddling club head out in their outrigger canoes for their early morning practice - a wonderful local tradition.

Everything in downtown Kona is within walking distance.  There is a trolley which charges $2 per transfer which makes its way to other points of interest within about a 5 mile radius.  Bike and moped rentals are available for those interested in exploring a little further.  Various tours can be arranged through many of the local vendors offering specials from night time Manta Ray tours to Helicopter Tours of the Volcano.  Although you could spend your entire visit locally without a car, one is highly recommended to explore many of the amazing island wonders! 

Hawaii Taxes of 13.416% are INCLUDED in your rate.  The breakdown is as follows:
9.25% Transitory Accommodation Tax (TAT)
4.16% General Excise Tax (GET)
Our Tax ID: W(phone number hidden)

Enjoy the tranquility of this tropical setting in our 400 sq ft condo steps from the ocean and the heart of Kona.  Beautifully updated and enjoying a wonderful energy, make this Tiki Treasure your home away from home.

HouseRules:
The condo association has "House Rules" for the complex, a copy of which can be found in a welcome binder in the condo.  They are mostly common sense and common courtesy to maintain enjoyment of the complex for ALL guests.  A couple worth pointing out however:

No Smoking is strictly enforced both on the complex and in individual units!  Complex management will enforce a $300 fine for anyone found in non-compliance.  Smoking anything (including pakalolo) within the unit or on the Lanai will result in forfeiture of your entire deposit. The front desk can direct you to the designated  smoking area.  

Parking: Vehicles not displaying the issued parking pass are liable to be towed.  Please return the parking pass to the lobby at the end of your stay.  Complex management imposes a $25 fee for non return.

Quiet time is observed between 10pm and 8am.

Within the unit we ask the following:

IMPORTANT - Please remove trash on a DAILY basis.  This helps prevent any bug issues in this humid tropical environment.

IMPORTANT - Please eat any food on the Lanai.  Again, this helps prevent bug issues and  maintains the unit for all future guests.

Not too painful... we hope you agree!  Basically it comes down to respecting your neighbor and environment.  With that said...

Now it's time to go out and have fun exploring this fabulous place.. or perhaps just kick back by the pool or the Lanai and catch up on much needed relaxation.  Whatever your choice - enjoy!







+Have fun and enjoy this amazing island!! Definitely recommended if you're passing through Kona!","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/ic/users/812614/profile_pic/1390177968/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Jing","rating":-1},{"date":1420416000,"text":"What a nice location. You are actually just across the street from the  ocean and on the strip or main drag for town. The suite itself is nice and has just about anything you would need for your stay in Kailua-Kona aside from a proper kitchen. It has recently been renovated and everything has been done very nicely. During the day we weft the doors open on both sides of the suite and had fresh air blasting through.

As a host Virginia was great. She was able to accommodate us with early check in and even left a little personalized note for us along with a basket of fruit. Her communication throughout the entire process was wonderful and she even checked to make sure we didn't need anything during our stay. Also Virginia keeps lots of gear (snorkel sets, cooler, chairs, boogie boards, etc) around so that you don't have to buy or rent it for many of the areas activities.

The absolute only problem we had during our entire stay was no fault of Virginia's. The suite is in a hotel that has some of it converted into timeshares. Not a big deal at all, but when we were checking in there was no one at the timeshare check in and the hotel staff will not help you check in so we ended up waiting about 30-45 minutes for someone to show up to check us in. Like I said no fault of Virginia's and nothing she could have done about it either way.

If I was coming back to Kailua-Kona I'd definitely keep Virginia's place in mind.","picture":"https://a0.muscache.com/ic/users/21254406/profile_pic/1410540432/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Patrick","rating":-1},{"date":1420156800,"text":"Room was exactly as described and shown in pictures on website.  Location is as central as you can get.  The base price for the room is appropriate but after the steep cleaning fee the final price per night makes it a bit too much if you are only staying for a short time.  The internet signal does not work in the room, even from the balcony so plan to sit in the lobby if you want internet access.  The balcony faces the communal swimming pool so if you are annoyed by the sound of screaming kids and family bbq then be prepared.  There is a steady flow of foot traffic outside the unit since there are many other units on the property and this one is right next to the lobby. The hosts are very responsive and very kind.  All and all it was a nice place and we were pleased with it.  157.00 is too high of a price point for a short stay.","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/ic/users/5020598/profile_pic/1419646802/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Heath","rating":-1},{"date":1420070400,"text":"We had a wonderful time at Virginia and Lee's condo! The space: The bedroom had the most comfortable bed ever, and that coupled with a very clean, quiet environment made for a relaxing stay. Though small, the place had everything we needed (and more) and was stocked with snorkel equipment, beach gear, and the best guide books. We enjoyed eating breakfast on the lanai each morning. The location was perfect, because it is two minute walk to the water, restaurants, shops, and sunset, yet somehow far enough away to remain a peaceful oasis.","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/ic/users/7636401/profile_pic/1374465693/original.jpg?interpolation=lanczos-none&crop=w:w;*,*&crop=h:h;*,*&resize=225:*&output-format=jpg&output-quality=70","name":"Julia","rating":-1},{"date":1413763200,"text":"The Apartment is Part of a very clean and safe Environment. {"ids":["air1836678","hma1554297","wts1398"],"queryType":"search","status":200,"page":1,"resultsPerPage":14,"amtOfNights":0,"sort":"pids","isNearQuery":false,"runtime":8,"result":[{"id":"air1836678","latLng":[52.530458779755,13.384358420761],"itemStatus":"published","attr":{"roomType":{"text":"Private room","id":1},"propType":{"text":"Apartment","id":0},"bathrooms":1,"description":"Hello Berlin-visitors! 
I am renting a cozy room in a shared two-bedroom apartment.

The room: about 24 sqm, with a 1,4m x 2m bed (about US-queen-size, big enough for a couple), and a desk. 
The flat: fully equipped kitchen, washing machine, a bath with bathtub, and wi-fi. 

The area: The flat is in Mitte, close to the “Rosenthaler Vorstadt”, where you will find all you need: two grocery stores, several cafes and restaurants (both cheap and very high end). It is an ideal place to start your sightseeing tour, since you are in walking distance (about 10-15 min) from the government district, Brandenburger Tor, Tiergarten, Unter den Linden, Alexanderplatz, Museumsinsel, Friedrichstraße, Mauer-Museum etc.

For going out, you are very close to Torstraße/Oranienburger Str., Prenzlauer Berg and Rosenthaler Platz (about 10 min), and you can be in Kreuzberg or Neukölln in about 15-20 min by subway. The U6 station “Naturkundemuseum” and Nordbahnhof (S1, S2, s25) are just around the corner, and two stops from Friedrichstraße, which is a big subway hub.

You can contact me in German, English, Spanish, French (and Italian if you are patient with I am renting a cozy room in a shared two-bedroom apartment.

The room: about 24 sqm, with a 1,4m x 2m bed (about US-queen-size, big enough for a couple), and a desk. 
The flat: fully equipped kitchen, washing machine, a bath with bathtub, and wi-fi. 

The area: The flat is in Mitte, close to the “Rosenthaler Vorstadt”, where you will find all you need: two grocery stores, several cafes and restaurants (both cheap and very high end). It is an ideal place to start your sightseeing tour, since you are in walking distance (about 10-15 min) from the government district, Brandenburger Tor, Tiergarten, Unter den Linden, Alexanderplatz, Museumsinsel, Friedrichstraße, Mauer-Museum etc.

For going out, you are very close to Torstraße/Oranienburger Str., Prenzlauer Berg and Rosenthaler Platz (about 10 min), and you can be in Kreuzberg or Neukölln in about 15-20 min by subway. The U6 station “Naturkundemuseum” and Nordbahnhof (S1, S2, s25) are just around the corner, and two stops from Friedrichstraße, which is a big subway hub.

The apartment offers great open plan living ideally suited for families, couples or business travelers wishing to have great social space. The kitchen is fully equipped for light or full dining having all the  amenities for a great stay including dishwasher, refrigerator and oven/cooktop.  3 large luxury bedrooms consisting of two bedrooms with large queen size beds and the third bedroom containing 2 single beds (can be moved together)  The apartment has two separate bathrooms the first with toilet and shower and the main bathroom with toilet, bidet, shower and full bath tub.
The leather lounge suite offers a great place to relax while enjoying the large screen TV or consider spending some time the two balconies or the superb roof top terrace.  The terrace provides a stunning 360 degree view over the city skyline with comfortable seating for up to 6 guests at the large outdoor table.  A full laundry is offered with washer and clothes dryer, particularly suited for guests traveling or staying longer.   The apartment also allows access to the communal sauna and gymnasium located in the underground section of the building.  If you are arriving by car we have underground car spaces available for 10 euro per day which must be reserved.



The apartment includes free wifi access with dedicated modem, bedding and towels, a hair dryer, shower gel, dishwasher tabs and washing up liquid. The apartment has a convenient washing machine and drying stand particularly suited for longer staying guests.  If you require a baby bed please contact us prior to confirm.


We meet all our guests at the apartment address.  It´s important that you contact us prior to arrival to ensure a smooth check-in as we do not live at the property.  During check-in we will provide you with a city map and are more than happy to answer any questions you have including local supermarkets, great eateries, sightseeing and public transport.  Please note any check-in after 9.30pm (21:30) attracts a 20 euro surcharge payable on check-in.

The apartment borders the hip Prenzlauer Berg area but with extremely close proximity to the centre of the city.  With plenty of green spaces, cafe's and restaurants in the local surroundings, the convenient subway Ubahn at the building entrance provices an excellent transport link for exploring the whole city. 

Mitte’s hotspots for culture and nightlife, Berlin's gallery area, such as hip Hackescher Markt and Oranienburger Straße, Museum Island and the state Opera are only a short distance away.  You won't find a more central, luxury and convenient location to enjoy your stay in Berlin with two convenient supermarkets within 400 metres of the apartment.


1 underground secure car space included with apartment.  Please contact us for additional spaces.
Naturkundenmuseum Ubahn station (underground) station located at front door of building with elevator.  2 stops to Friedrichstrasse Train station.
25 minute walk to Brandenburg Gate. 
25 minutes by taxi to Tegel Airport.


All our calendars are kept up-to-date.
Eye masks are provided in the apartment particularly over Summer with its roof position and large windows.


Brand new penthouse located in Central Mitte.  Stunning roof terrace overlooking the city.

HouseRules:
No smoking inside the apartment.
Quiet from 10pm each night.
Please send us your arrival details (by air, car or train) as soon as you have them in order to ensure a smooth check-in.
Once you arrive in Berlin please contact us to re-confirm a meeting time at the apartment;
By air – once you have collected your luggage.
By car – once you are 30 minutes from the apartment.
By train – once you arrive at central station.
Early check-in´s possible before 3pm but please contact us first.
Late check-outs after 10am may be possible but please contact us first.
If you are checking in after 9.30pm, a 20 euro surcharge applies payable on check-in.
Absolutely no more guests permitted to stay than what has been booked for.

Internet","id":22},{"text":"Kitchen","id":15}],"reviews":{"count":31,"rating":5,"entries":[{"date":1419638400,"text":"Our family of four stayed at this wonderful flat from Dec 20-27, 2014. We were met and greeted by an extremely helpful woman who fully explained everything to us about this beautifully equipped residence although it was all clear and user-friendly. The flat was spacious and immaculate with every convenience, including exceptional heating (helpful in the cold weather!). The wall of windows in the flat made it feel light-filled even on the most gray of days.The flat was also less than 5 steps from a subway U-Bahn station on an extremely efficient subway line which left us able to take public transit to t all we wished to see in Berlin. The flat is situated in a lovely, safe neighborhood, not touristy, and within a 10-15 minute walk of some of the best restaurants we tried in Berlin. In addition, many of the popular sights can be reached by foot within that time frame. For extreme ease of use, a great coffee shop is downstairs, a bakery across the street and a grocery store 2 blocks away. We fully plan on returning to this flat whenever our travels take us to Berlin!","picture":"https://a2.muscache.com/defaults/user_pic-225x225.png?v=2","name":"Karen","rating":-1},{"date":1417219200,"text":"This apartment was perfect for our group (my in-laws, husband, me, and our 1.5 year old daughter) during our recent week-long stay in Berlin and I would highly recommend the apartment to anyone travelling with a family.  The apartment itself is very clean, large, nicely decorated, and well maintained.  Particularly when travelling with a small child, it was great to have a kitchen and washer/dryer in the apartment.  Marcus also kindly supplied us with a nice travel crib, so that made the trip much easier for us.  

The best part about this apartment for us was the location.  The apartment is located in Mitte, with a large Rewe grocery store just down the street.  We could get almost anywhere in the (very large and sprawling) city within 5-10 minutes due to the apartment's proximity to the ubahn station.  We literally walked out the front door and the Naturekunde museum ubahn stop (with an elevator entrance) was 10 meters away.  The station itself is small, but it is well-connected to the major ubahn lines that take you to all of the big tourism sites. We are nonsmokers (smokers are welcome to use the terrace), but have three cuddly cats!

I work at home because I also have my studio here so I am always in reach of my guests.

I will usually meet my guest for check-in and check-out, so I can show them around and help if there are questions. I love to go out when I'm not working but am happy if someone joins me for a coffee break. 

Ich teile gern Küche und Esszimmer, die Terrasse, das Bad und das Gäste-WC.

- 1 Minute to U-Bahn Naturkundemuesum 
- Ca. 10 minutes to Central Station! 
- Ca. 3 minutes to Nordbahnhof 
- Ca. 5 minutes to Friedrichsstraße 

The living room has everything that you need including flat tv and wifi internet connection. The room is very bright due to the big windows. Additionally the apartment has a balcony for sunny breakfasts in the morning. 
The bedroom is next to the living room with one big double bed (200x200). Additional people could sleep on an additional mattress in the living room. 

The kitchen is equipped with everything you need + nespresso coffee machine and dishwasher. 
Sheets and towels will be provided.

The artistically designed bedrooms and interior spaces of baxpax Mitte Hostel have been styled and transformed into unique pieces of art.

As the first hostel in Germany it represents the Australian thought of backpacking in each square millimetre. In our lounge you will make friendships for life. All rooms were designed by international artists and create an unconventional and creative atmosphere. Here, you can lie down and gain new energy and advice for your upcoming trips.

Our hostel is located on 2 floors. A kitchen, reception and lounge provide the sociability factor. Show off your cooking skills in the charming lounge and have fun while lounging, eating and flirting.

The newest pride of our baxpax family is located in the very heart of Berlin, just a few minutes walking distance to Oranienburger Strae, Kunsthaus Tacheles and to the popular nightlife district Hackesche Hfe. Take the bus and be in only 3 minutes at the main station, 3 U-stations to the Brandenburg Gate and only 4 U-stations to the lively Potsdamer Platz.

We are not a party hostel but we will help you to have a good time in Berlin. We can offer you insider-tips that will make for a truly rewarding experience.

PLEASE NOTE: If your room is not ready at check in, you may store your stuff at the reception and come back later.

Bed linens are not included in the prices mentioned. The use of bed linen is obligatory and a one-time-fee of 2,50  is charged per person.


We look forward to seeing and welcoming you!


See your own style

Your baxpax team

Furthermore, Easy access to Berlin central train station (5-mins) and Tegel Airport (20-mins) with car or public transport.

- Big HD TV + AppleTV, Netflix, HBO, Hulu (tons of free movies, shows)

- A nice balcony with table & chairs 
- A luxurious ground heating for Berlin winters, and a fan for summers
